description: Gets the status of a namespace deletion task.

nested_items.name: namespaceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the namespace that is being deleted.

nested_items.name: namespaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the namespace that is being deleted.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the deletion request.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: An error code returned by the namespace deletion task.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: An error code returned by the namespace deletion task.
